anytime: Hey there sexy!
You’re that “Nothing” when people ask me what I’m thinking about.
I bet you make babies smile.
You are the most perfect you there is.
Is that your picture next to “charming” in the dictionary?
You’re all that and a super-size bag of chips.
How is it that you always look great, even in sweatpants?
I bet you sweat glitter.
You were cool way before hipsters were cool.
You’re more fun than a ball pit filled with candy.
You’re better than a triple-scoop ice cream cone. With sprinkles.
You’re more fun than bubble wrap.
There’s ordinary, and then there’s you.
I bet you do the crossword puzzle in ink.

Are you a magician? 
 Because every time I look at you, everyone else disappears.

Do you have a map?  
 I just keep getting lost in your eyes.

Do you believe in fate? 
 Because I think we've just had a 'meet-cute'.

Is your name Google? 
 Because you have everything I've been searching for.

Do you have a Band-Aid? 
 Because I just scraped my knee falling for you.

Are you a parking ticket? 
 Because you've got 'fine' written all over you.

Are you made of copper and tellurium? 
 Because you're Cu-Te!

Are you a baker? 
 Because you're a batch made in heaven.
Do you have a name, or can I call you mine?

Is your aura made of real gold? 
 Because I feel rich just being around you.

Are you a campfire? 
 Because you're hot and I want s'more.

Is your dad a boxer? 
 Because you're a knockout!

Are you WiFi? 
 Because I'm feeling a connection.

Are you a snowstorm? 
 Because you're making my heart race.

Do you have a sunbeam in your pocket? 
 Because you just lit up my world.

Did it hurt when you fell from the vending machine? 
 Because you're a snack!

Are you a loan from a bank? 
 Because you have my interest.

Are you a banana? 
 Because I find you a-peeling.

Did we just share electrons? 
 Because I'm feeling a covalent bond.

Are you a gardener? 
 Because I see our love bloss-om-ing.

Are you a lighthouse? 
 Because you just guided me out of the darkness.

Is your name Waldo? 
 Because someone like you is hard to find.

Did you just come out of the oven? 
 Because you're hot!

Are you a library book? 
 Because I'm checking you out.

Are you an alien? 
 Because you've just abducted my heart.

Are you a time traveler? 
 Because I can't imagine my future without you.
Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I pass by again?

Are you a camera? 
 Because every time I look at you, I smile.

Do you come with coffee? 
 Because you're brewing up feelings in me.

Are you a dictionary? 
 Because you add meaning to my life.

Is your name Chapstick? 
 Because you're da balm.

Do you have a quarter? 
 Because I want to call my mom and tell her I met the one.

Are you a 90-degree angle? 
 Because you're looking right.

Do you have a pencil? 
 Because I want to erase your past and write our future.

Is your name Swiffer? 
 Because you just swept me off my feet.
morning: Who needs coffee when you have your smile?
afternoon: You're more fun than bubble wrap!
evening: You made someone smile today, I know it.
The day was better for your efforts.
